MonteCarlo: (singleMuPass || singleIsoMuPass || singleEPass || singleESingleMuPass || singleMuSingleEPass || doubleMuPass || doubleMuDZPass || doubleEPass || tripleEPass || tripleMuPass || doubleESingleMuPass || doubleMuSingleEPass)
MuonEG: ((singleESingleMuPass || singleMuSingleEPass || doubleMuSingleEPass || doubleESingleMuPass) && !(doubleMuPass || doubleMuDZPass || tripleMuPass) && !(doubleEPass || tripleEPass))
SingleElectron: (singleEPass && !(singleESingleMuPass || singleMuSingleEPass || doubleMuSingleEPass || doubleESingleMuPass) && !(doubleMuPass || doubleMuDZPass || tripleMuPass) && !(doubleEPass || tripleEPass))
SingleMuon: ((singleMuPass || singleIsoMuPass) && !(singleEPass || singleESingleMuPass || singleMuSingleEPass || doubleMuSingleEPass || doubleESingleMuPass) && !(doubleMuPass || doubleMuDZPass || tripleMuPass) && !(doubleEPass || tripleEPass))
